features.name: Keen Senses
features.description: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: You have advantage on attack rolls against creatures within 5 ft. of any ally that is not incapacitated.

features.name: Maul
features.description: Melee: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d8 + 1) slashing damage

features.name: Bite
features.description: Melee: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d8 + 1) piercing damage.

features.name: Pounce
features.description: Save: DC 15 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage. The target is knocked prone and grappled by you.
